title: AttributeError: 'SummaryWriter' object has no attribute 'flush'
body:
```

  File "/home/vladimir/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/catalyst/dl/callbacks/logging.py", line 175, in on_loader_end

AttributeError: 'SummaryWriter' object has no attribute 'flush'
```
